translation: Āsmanuk qasm byyhi tamhi chyzuk qasm yus rat kh vqth nnan chhu,
Tohyhi kus chyz zạnhi ravi ya rsvl Allah kh suh rat kiyut yivun kus chyz chhu?
Suh chuh taruk akh przlh vun, (jvab qsm chhu)
Chuhnh kanhh shkhṣah mgr tas petth chhu aakh rạchh.
Pas vuchihn yhi ansan kamhi nishhi āv suh pạdh krnh, (tmis ne yad chhu bvuzin asụ̄ vnvs)
Suh āv pạdh krnh ainzal kh vqth votth divunhi ābh nishhi yʿny ābi mny.
Yus nyran mrdn hndyv pushtv mnzh znann hnzv synh taryv mnz.
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ Allah tʿālyā chhu ts ansans mrnh pth byyhi zndh krns petth qdrt vvl.
Yymhi doh nanhi ravnh th prkhavnh yin diln hndụ̄ pvshydh khyal.
Ps āshi nh tamhi doh amis ansans kanhh ṭaqtah nh kanhh mddgarah.
Byyhi chhu qasm rvud travvunhi āsmanuk.
Byyhi chhu qasm phtth vunhi zmynuk.
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ yhi qrāni mjyd chhu klamah fạṣlh krvun.
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ kạfr chhi pzis ankar krns andr rnga rng mkr th ḥylh kran.
Bthi chhus pvz nnhi ravnh khạṭrh tdbyr kran.
Ps mhlt diyiv tvhụ̄ kạfrn, soe mhlt diyvukh km kynhh kalah, vuchhiv timn kya bnhi.
